messages.message: model-service is kinda unique. It spins up grpc servers within the service (in the same container as the service itself). The main server forward requests it receives to these servers. I am not an expert but maybe itâ€™s got something to do with how these grpc servers are spun up.
Ah, I bet context isn't propagating over to those mini GRPC servers

context propagation and tracing should be working for those paths iirc, for model service the traces generated is very low 1 trace every few seconds I think, which is probably generated by model service HealthChecks.
